ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to game ballance issues so I am told by a GM - not the word MAY never is no a definate not going to happen. I have heard rumours in the coming weeks it may
ygData.messageBody:
rfunk@... wrote:

> From: rfunk@...
>
> Ok, not entirely on topic but does anyone know how you achieve
> specialization once you hit 20th level? I tried the trainer but nothing on
> specialization even thought it was listed as a skill gained at 20th earlier
> in the game. Does it work? Thanks.
>
> specialization has been removed from the game and MAY never be implemented due

to game ballance issues so I am told by a GM - not the word MAY never is no a definate not going to happen. I have heard rumours in the coming weeks it may be reintroduced. It was never fully implemented and never worked when it was an option to
train in it yeilded no results.

Xzar
